plot: Nine love stories that use famous songs as theme. A man remembers his first love. A woman meets her team's star rugby player after many years. A salaryman runs away with a gangster's girlfriend. A man returns to his hometown where his former girlfriend disappeared. A man starts to have second thoughts near his wedding. A man plans his break-up. The leader of a mob falls in love with a hostess. A bar owner starts a relationship with a baseball star. A carefree reporter and his stern colleague agree to meet on a Christmas eve.
